title: ISecondaryMemberBetweenPointsFeatureData.LengthRatioMember1
description: Gets and sets the length ratio offset from the end of the first member of the primary structure system member pair.
returns: 0.0 <= Length ratio offset from the end of the first member <= 1.0
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISecondaryMemberBetweenPointsFeatureData::SecondaryMemberOffsetType
is set to
swSecondaryMemberBetweenPointsDistanceFromEndType_e
.swSecondaryMemberBetweenPointsDistanceFromEndType_LengthRatio.
